title: The Living filter
creator_credit: Hornbein-Wood Films and Pennsylvania State University
brief_description: Describes an experiment in which municipal waste water was used to irrigate forest and farmland, thereby increasing plant growth and purifying the water to drinking quality. The experiment also suggests the potential use of the technique in reclaiming strip-mined land.
